The `recordTask` method is part of a class responsible for handling tasks related to data collection or performance metrics within an application using Panda3D's clock system for accurate time measurement. This method records raw data points by calculating elapsed time since the start of recording and invoking `self.recordPoint(time)`, fitting into a larger system that likely includes data logging or animation capture functionalities.

def recordTask(self, state):
        # Record raw data point
        time = self.recordStart + (
            ClockObject.getGlobalClock().getFrameTime() - state.startTime)
        self.recordPoint(time)
        return Task.cont
